principles: Fusion over Imitation: Medical Imaging x Sci-Fi HUD x Swiss Precision
Emotion First: Clinical precision, trust, and 'dark room' focus
Content is King: Data is the hero; UI is the frame
Negative Space: Critical for separating dense medical data
Contrast: High-contrast neon against deep slate for readability in dark environments

typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@300;400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;700&display=swap');

layout_strategies.dashboard_grid: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-4 p-4 md:p-6

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(6,182,212,0.3)] transition-all duration-300

cards.default: bg-card border border-border/50 shadow-lg hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors duration-300
cards.interactive: group relative overflow-hidden bg-card border border-border/50 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-background border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 transition-all duration-200

image_urls.instructions: Use these placeholder URLs for the MVP. Ensure they are replaced with real medical imaging data or high-quality assets in production. Do not leave empty src attributes.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Ensure 'dark' class is applied to the html/body by default. The app is 'Dark Mode First'.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: Override the default radius in tailwind.config.js to 0.5rem (rounded-md) for a technical feel.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid strategy for the dashboard. Avoid large empty white spaces. Use borders and subtle background differences to define areas.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts with the custom palette defined in 'colors.semantic'. Ensure grid lines are very subtle (opacity 0.1).

6. VOLUME VIEWER: For the MVP, create a 'Mock' Volume Viewer component using a dark canvas with a grid overlay and the 'ct_scan' placeholder image centered. Add UI controls (sliders) around it to simulate functionality.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid attributes to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards) as 'category-function-element' (e.g., 'dashboard-upload-button').
8. NO GRADIENT TEXT: Do not use gradient text for headings. It reduces readability in medical contexts. Use solid, high-contrast white or off-white.
9. BORDERS: Use 'border-white/10' for subtle separation. Avoid heavy borders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids.
Micro-Interactions: Every button must have a hover state (brightness up or subtle lift).
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for container padding. Don't cram content.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-md for floating elements (navbars, modals).
Accessibility: Ensure all text meets WCAG AA contrast ratios against the dark background.
